titleStmt.title: A proclamation anent the peace of the Highlands
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James VII)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the twenty seventh day of May, one thousand six hundred eighty six years. And of Our Reign the second year.
Signed: Will. Paterson, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
